headline: Robinhood US Lists CZ-backed ASTER and Tether’s Plasma (XPL) for Trading
summary: Leading digital assets trading platform, Robinhood US, has officially listed Binance’s ASTER, Tether’s Plasma (XPL), and Virtuals Protocol (Virtuals) for trading on October 16. headline: Schwab Says It’s ‘Already Winning’ With Gen Z Investors
summary: “The average age of our clients continues to get younger,” Wurster said.  Schwab was a pioneer in retail investing, leading the brokerage industry’s charge to lower commission costs.  Robinhood, whose stock price has more than tripled this year, was getting closer to Schwab's market value last week before stocks stumbled.

headline: Not Your Daddy’s Broker: How Robinhood Stacks Up Against Charles Schwab
summary: Until last Friday’s Trash Crash in the stock and crypto markets, app-centric trading platform Robinhood was on its way to overtaking Charles Schwab, the original discount broker, in market value.  Schwab, which gave an upbeat fall business update today, is no Blockbuster Video to Robinhood’s Netflix.  The two have different core customers, and Schwab’s are a lot richer.
